pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ecological Indices Calculator for Nematode Communities // Provides a computational toolkit for analyzing nematode communities in ecological studies. Includes methods to quantify nematode-based ecological indicators such as metabolic footprints, energy flow metrics, and community structure. These tools support assessments of soil health, ecosystem functioning, and trophic interactions, standardizing the use of nematodes as bioindicators.
